name: Scarecrowstory
0:
”Alexa, start scarecrow story”
”Alexa, open scarecrow story”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: scarecrow story
des:
Play an interactive adventure-themed story with sound effects and prompts. 
Fill in the blanks, with one character, a disabled scarecrow man, who stands motionless in your fields as a scare crow for a living, discover how he realizes that crows are intelligent and sensitive creatures with a mind of their own and how we share our habitats with them.
Get ready for laughs and giggles as players fill in the blanks.
This skill was created using a Skill Blueprint. Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
